content.rendered:
Admission

Step 1:  Hospital will be contacted by e-mail address info@crh.ae  or by phone +971 3 719 5000

Step 2:  Family consent for release of information and for assessment will be obtained

Step 3:  Medical report to be sent to CRH at info@crh.ae

Step 4:  Initial assessment will be done and verified

Step 5:  Hospital Agreement and Thiqa preauthorization to be signed by the patient / legal guardian

Step 6:  Transfer process will be followed

Patient referral by a physician

To refer a patient, please send an email to info@crh.ae  or you may submit your details using this online form, and one of our staff will contact you at soonest possible.
